TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigXPathTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由 W3C 定义的数字签名 XPath 转换。

span.span: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许你解决使用 XPath 语言的 XML 文档。The class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language. 此类使用 XPath 表达式来选择你想要签名或同时删除所有其他任一加密操作从加密的 XML 节点。This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation. 使用类签名或加密的 XML 文档使用 XPath 表达式的特定部分。Use the class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression. 有关信息初始化类到 XPath 转换字符串的值，请参阅方法。For information on initializing the class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the method. 描述的统一资源标识符 (URI)类定义由字段。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关 XPath 转换的详细信息，请参阅部分 6.6.3 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何进行签名和验证 XML 文档使用通过封装签名的类。The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class with an envelope signature. 此示例对 XML 文档，并将签名保存在新的 XML 文档。This example signs an XML document and saves the signature in a new XML document. 第二个代码示例演示如何调用的成员类。The second code example demonstrates how to call members of the class. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/VB/sample.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]

summary.span: 返回 对象的参数的 XML 表示形式，适合以 XMLDSIG 元素的子元素的形式来包含这些参数。

span.span: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 节点的列表，这些节点表示描述 XMLDSIG 元素中当前 对象所需的特定于转换的内容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的输出。

span.span: Returns the output of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索包含的 XML 表示形式的 XPath 转换的对象。Use the method to retrieve a object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象分析为 元素的特定于转换的内容，并配置当前 对象的内部状态以匹配 元素。

span.span: Parses the specified object as transform-specific content of a element and configures the internal state of the current object to match the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以初始化利用 XPath 转换的类。Use the method to initialize the class with an XPath transform. 若要初始化利用 XPath 转换类中，完成以下步骤。To initialize the class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps. 1. 创建一个新类，然后设置属性 XPath 转换字符串的值。Create a new class and set the property to the value of an XPath transform string. 2. 调用方法来创建表示转换的对象。Call the method to create an object that represents the transform. 3. 创建的新实例类，并传递先前创建对象传递给方法。Create a new instance of the class and pass the previously created object to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何进行签名和验证 XML 文档使用类。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class. 此示例创建一个封装签名。This sample creates an envelope signature.
